website_summaries.verdict: An affordable black seed oil that is both potent and easier to take than using a teaspoon and bottle.
pros: Pure cold-pressed oil with no fillers or other active ingredients
cons: Reports that this oil causes nausea or other stomach problems
Some claimed that it had a bad taste that lasted for hours

customer_reviews.title: WARNING-Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: ALLERGY WARNING: I took one pill and a minute later had severe shortness of breath, swelling, and my throat closed up! Since purchasing I have learned black seed oil interacts negatively with prescription meds like Beta Blockers. Check with your doctor before purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: ACE11

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not kidding you. Within an hour of taking this I felt a shift in my body. I thought nahhhh. But let me tell you there is something powerful about this oil. I have more energy, I sleep better, I think more clearly and I am more alert than before. But what was really remarkable was that I suffered with piles for over 40 years and I am seeing an improvement in that condition.and I've only used this for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Inc

customer_reviews.title: This works wonders!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! It was definitely made by God himself!! Let me tell you, my blood sugar levels have never been better!! im a person that suffers with horrible insomnia, and guess what, I’ve been able to sleep like a baby since I’ve been taking this. My hair has gotten thicker, THis definitely works!! I’m ordering two more bottles after I type this!!
customer_reviews.author: Marina garcia

customer_reviews.title: Black Seed Oil that works!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent Black Seed Oil. I'm on the Keto diet and I was recommended to start taking this in addition to MCT Oils. This is very good quality and easy to swallow capsules. Black Seed Oil, if one researches it, is effective at many things in the body. All I can tell is that if you take this on a Keto diet combined with intermittent fasting, be prepared to see the fat disappear especially in the lower abdominal area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware other ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the product yesterday and noticed that on the label, other ingredients: it lists silicon dioxide as an ingredient. This was failed to be listed on the description info. After research, this chemical compound is found in quartz and sand used in glass, pottery and inside computers! Crystalline silica ( silicon dioxide) is a potent respiratory hazard. Lenntech.com
customer_reviews.author: Soffiea

customer_reviews.title: Color =quality
customer_reviews.text: Blackseed is known for its depth in color. I did an experiment with Amazing Herb Blackseed on left and this one on the right. It is inferior to Amazing Herbs hands down. Color speaks for itself
customer_reviews.author: kristen goin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these black seed oil pills for my grandmother who has stage 4 pancreatic cancer because I have read that it actually kills cancer cells, among other great properties. After the first day, swelling in her legs decreased dramatically and the circumference of her liquid filled stomach decreased by 2 inches!!! I am sooo excited for future results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncusty

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been feeling that great lately, not sure why. I have heard that Black Seed Oil is a cure for just about everything so was willing to give this one a try as it is non GMO and cold pressed and made in USA. I was not disappointed, I am feeling better and have more energy than I have had in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ellyooo

customer_reviews.title: Black Seed Oil
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oil for generalized pain, fibromyalgia and arthritis. Nothing else was helping and I prefer the natural remedies. I only take 1 capsule a day but it has gotten rid of 90% of my pain. I highly recommend Black Seed Oil for pain. I noticed someone said it helped with energy. I don't know if the black seed oil did this but I have noticed that I don't sleep in since I have been taking it and I am doing more outside chores. Of course our Florida sauna summers probably contributed to lack of going outside much. Any way I am very pleased with the great results of reducing pain.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Foster

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap!!!!! OK I JUST STARTED TAKING THIS JUST BECAUSE. So I wasn't planning on writing a review but I just had to. In a nutshell...I had pizza tonight. Pizza gives me heartburn EVERY SINGLE TIME!!! I thought I forgot to take my heartburn medicine but it wasn't that I forgot it....I didn't need it. No heartburn AT ALL! Now this is shocking for real. I only been taking this stuff for 3 days now. Im already noticing stuff like this. I'll post more when I get more results. I really wasn't expecting anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall Health
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I have been taking black seed oil and the pills I have seen an overall change in my health. My blood sugar is down and has been kept down below 120. My cholesterol points dropped to the point that my doctor may take me off the medication. My blood pressure is normal and I have lost weight. I have more stamina and less pain around the joints. I love it and will continue taking it. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT DEFINITELY WORKS!! DONT HESITATE TO PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying AWESOME and I mean AWESOME STUFF!!! THIS RIGHT HERE IS A MIRACLE IN A BOTTLE!!! My hubby had 2 major back surgeries so far. Still needs another in the future and possible hip replacement as well!!! What I will tell you is he has used so many different pain pills in the past. They hardly helped the pain and made him violently sick. This right here is a miracle in a bottle!!! Works very fast!!! No more yelling and moaning at night when he moves around!!! I can sleep!!!! We just reordered 2 more bottles!!! This product does not disappoint!!! And well worth every dollar!!!!

So far, I have noticed that my hair feels and looks more healthy. I also have avoided the nasty flu and viruses that have plagued everyone this winter which I attribute to adding Black Seed Oil. The only issue, if you can call it that, is the taste of Oregano when you burp.

customer_reviews.title: Sickness be gone!
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second bottle of Black Seed Oil capsules. I feel that taking these has boosted my immune system and is keeping me from getting sick so far this season. I will continue taking them as winter approaches. The all natural ingredients are good for your body. I am anxious to see if these capsules will keep me healthy through the winter. UPDATE: Fast forward to November 7, 2019. I have continued taking Black Seed Oil to this date, never missing a day. I have not been sick year round. I'm a believer in them. Just ordered a new bottle today. I don't let myself run out. Glad a friend told me about them.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be growing my eyelashes!
customer_reviews.text: Healths Harmony Black Seed Oil has been a wonderful addition to my supplement regimen. I use it to help support my liver and pancreas, and also to help manage pain from post-cholecystectomy syndrome. I take 2 capsules daily; one with breakfast and one with dinner, and after nearly a month of consistent use, my pain has greatly improved. I'm really impressed! Is this product supposed to grow your lashes, though? My eyelashes are getting longer and this is the only new supplement I have started taking. Not a terrible side effect! I will definitely be reordering.

customer_reviews.title: Better Breathing & More Energetic
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would give Black Seed oil a try since I read about the how it benefits the body. Within mins I could tell the difference in breathing & I felt more energetic. Also, it decrease some of my muscle & joint pain due to an autoimmune disorder. This product works fantastic!!!

Black seed oil is deep amber, this one is yellow like olive oil. Not going to buy again. But it arrived on time. I cancelled the subscription and was sent yet another bottle.

I was having headaches and sneezing my head off before I started taking the black seed oil capsules. Now I've only sneezed once in the past three weeks and no headaches, so I know that it's working. Everyone else around me is suffering and I'm smooth sailing! I've also gotten more compliments about my skin glowing, and my hair and nails are growing faster as well. Can't go wrong with these!

customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: One hit wonder!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product, but in the few days I’ve taken it I have seen and felt a difference. I suffer from severe lower back pain, migraines, pain in my bones, I’m overweight my hair is super dry! A few days into this newly added supplement in my morning routine WOW I feel the difference. I become full faster. My hair seems to be a little healthier less dry, brittle and dull! My skin feels smoother. My pain has decreased significantly! I can’t wait to be on this a bit longer to see more positive results!
customer_reviews.author: Jezzy J

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering these pills and I love them! I was initially taking the black seed oil liquid but, well, it leaves an aftertaste that is not the most pleasant, lol. Very good for you just ugh. Anywho I saw these and I purchased them and I love them. I feel great and it helps me maintain my blood pressure and other issues that I refuse to take prescription meds for.
customer_reviews.author: TexasTea

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I'm 70 yrs young, and during the night I made about 3 to 4 visits to the bathroom. Now I may visit once after 4 hours of sleeping if any, most of the time after 3 months of use, I sleep right through the night.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I started taking this Black Seed Oil about a month ago. We both noticed that we started feeling better in just a few days. Not quite as tired and less body pain. I have fibromyalgia and it hasn't been as aggressive as it usually is too. We also noticed an over all well being feeling, kind of like taking St. John's Wort or 5HTP.
customer_reviews.author: Cillie

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow if you have any kind of pain....muscle or joint pain, etc. give this a try! My hip was killing me for years from a prior accident and nothing worked. This stuff literally took the pain away in less than a week!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: sleeping better so no
customer_reviews.text: Only been a few weeks so not much to go on but my energy level is higher ..sleeping better so no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Mztete

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This stuff knocks me out so naturally I take it at bedtime. We'll see if it really is a miracle cure for all diseases as some people claim. Only time will tell. I like that it's non GMO, that's important. Capsules are definitely the way to go with this stuff. Taking a spoon full of the oil is equivalent to torture.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: So far I haven't noticed any noticeable health changes or benefits  from taking this product.
customer_reviews.text: after the 3rd day of taking this product @ 2am I was awaken with a tummy ache.@ 5am it was accompanied with a tremendous bm, however I'm better than average in that area! I'm taking this product in hopes of lowering my blood pressure, so far it hasn't helped. I'm also a light sleeper, easily awaken & not so quick to go back to sleep, and this supplement hasn't improved or made my sleeping abilities better unlike others. Perhaps I need a stronger dosage or it may take longer for me to see results. So far it hasn't done anything for me.
customer_reviews.author: Actual-Facts

customer_reviews.title: great results quick
customer_reviews.text: I mix it with a little orange juice. Great improvement in my elbow joint; pain almost completely gone. Had mold toxicity but now feel normal again and my lymph glands have shrunk back to normal size all within just a weeks time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: USE CAUTION
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about a week and noticed my sleep improved a lot. I'm sleeping through the night now. I used to wake up every 4 hours but now I'm sleeping 7-8hrs straight. The caution I'm referring to is the way it suppresses your appetite. The last two days I was having headaches and it wasn't until yesterday that I realized that at 4 PM that I hadn't eaten anything since breakfast that morning. So when taking this, even when you don't feel hungry, make sure you're eating your meals and this will fit perfectly into your supplement routine.
customer_reviews.author: CCxSuga

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: After reading about Black Seed Oil and how it's supposed to help with so many different things I decided to try it. Almost finished with my first bottle and just ordered the second. So far I can say I definitely see a difference with my stomach issues! Eating all kinds of things and able to drink coffee again!!! Hoping the second bottle will be the one that takes me back to full health after years of issues. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Wellness MIRACLE!
customer_reviews.text: My skin has been glowing!!! I’m getting more and more compliments on my skin. I’m more flexible. It feels like my body is revitalized since I’ve taken these. My thoughts are more clear, more and more positive. It’s cleared my mind of stress! Amazing! Try these! I’ve heard they cure everything but death... and now I’m a believer!
customer_reviews.author: OhHeyHoney

customer_reviews.title: Lower Blood pressure...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help lower my blood pressure while helping my cholesterol too. I heard this may help with that but it is necessary to take for 2-3 months to see results so I don't have any feedback yet. It has appeared since starting this that my BP has stablized though and even that is a good thing!
customer_reviews.author: KGB

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: On my second batch. I find this brand very effective in managing my pain from Osteo-Arthritis. No more Melxeocam/Mobic. I am not having after burp and I accidently chewed a capsule and the strong solvent taste is barely present as with some other brands. Two capsules daily is sufficient for me needs. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alta Cannaday

customer_reviews.title: A hidden treasure
customer_reviews.text: Upon researching the benefits of black seed oil, I knew that it would have to become a staple in my life. Choosing the right black seed oil product was the next step. I carefully ponder and went back and forth between products until I just took a gammon and purchase this particular brand. I notice the difference in many ways... so the product definitely was beneficial to me and will continue to be a staple in my house.
customer_reviews.author: M. B Dunnings

customer_reviews.title: Has a strong taste
customer_reviews.text: I am a pretty discriminating shopper. I purchased one bottle of this product and another bottle from a different source. I bit into them one at a time and waited for a while. This product provides a much stronger taste than the other product. It is very bitter and almost burns your mouth slightly. I know bitter herbs in general are usually quite medicinal so I feel it is most likely a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven W. Blank

customer_reviews.title: I like it..
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually torn on if this is helping with all the things people say it will help with. I have lost weight but I've been exercising more as well. It has suppressed my appetite. I am going to continue taking it to see if things continue to change. I have taken a full bottle and I'm on my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: For me, it drastically reduced my appetite. I was very skeptical at first. I hate scales so l don't know how much weight l've lost, but l can notice a real difference in how my clothes fit.
customer_reviews.author: momcat

customer_reviews.title: Instant relief!!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe I felt a difference the first day. The normal muscle pain was gone. My neighbor saw me working outside at 8pm in my garden and questioned me. I couldn't believe it either. I had worked outside all day and still felt great and energized. The second day I slept 12 hours. After weeks of 2 to 3 hours sleep a night. I've never done that before. I didn't wake up groggy and it's been back to 8 hours a night since. I can't wait to see how much better I can feel.
customer_reviews.author: Laina Couture

customer_reviews.title: I'm definitely loving this oil... I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm definitely loving this oil ...I bought it along with another brand in the liquid version to compare because I'm a first timer to using this oil...and this one by far exceeded my expectation...notice much more energy and overall feeling of well being ...I stopped using the liquid ..kept up with this one my nails are growing and my skin on my face feels baby soft...I take them everyday..
customer_reviews.author: SaMone

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is the third brand of black seed oil that I've tried and it's my favorite. The price is better than the first brand I tried, but higher than the second brand. However, I believe that the potency with this one by Healths Harmony is better than my second brand and equal to the first. Sorry if that's confusing, but suffice it to say that this is my new go-to brand for black seed oil!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Pills are half empty...
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed,none of the pills were full sone were even less then half way smh.I will not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Dream

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: I have had chronic pain from bursitis in my hip for the last eight years as well as elevated blood pressure. I have been taking this product for about 18 months and it has helped with both conditions. Unlike many supplements for these conditions, Healths Harmony's Black Seed Oil is both affordable and effective. I am grateful to have found it.
customer_reviews.author: L. K. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Not Natural
customer_reviews.text: This product is not 100% BSO , it contains d-alpha tocopheryl acetate and silicon dioxide.. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Camellia Durden

customer_reviews.title: Price was good but...
customer_reviews.text: The price of this one was good, but the effect wasn't there compared to taking the oil straight. The taste of the oil is pretty potent and not favorable, so this made for an interesting test as an alternative. However, the effect was no better than a placebo pill. Going back to the straight oil was quite noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Poc Network // Tech

customer_reviews.title: veggie omega 3
customer_reviews.text: Take the black seed oil daily with my fish oil & medication at night. And if I wanted to I could replace my fish oil capsules with the black oil capsules.
customer_reviews.author: not replying for reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin!
customer_reviews.text: I am taking about a tablespoon a day of this, and while I'm not exactly sure what it's doing for me internally, but I trust it's good stuff, I also use it on my face before bed with a little vitamin E oil and retin A in over the counter Differin gel, and it is a total game changer! Like the most expensive anti-aging cream, but super affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Ann Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this supplement to help manage a wide variety of health concerns. I love how I feel when I'm taking it, most especially the fact that it eliminates my brain fog and helps me think more clearly! The capsules themselves taste fine, but you may notice a bit of a taste when you burp later. Fight through it! The benefits are worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Knudson

customer_reviews.title: Natural Pain Relief in this little pill
customer_reviews.text: I take this once in the morning along with my other supplements and once at night...and I see a difference in my pain. I deal with costochondritis and intercoastal neuralgia, so the pain is usually in my upper body, around shoulders, and chest area.
customer_reviews.author: Holly M. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Luv it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these pills I lost a few pounds from taking two pills daily you can’t miss a day . I can’t smell them until I burp that’s we I know the pill has busted inside my belly make sure you drink water behide it at least two bottles and you’ll b just fine
customer_reviews.author: KingTinyy

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing. I have not had it long now but ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I have not had it long now but already my husband and I have tried it out to battle a sinus infection, stomach flu, and cold and sinus problems the kids had. I even feel a difference when taking it daily as a preventative herb. Highly recommend to any and everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Lita

customer_reviews.title: A word of advice
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been taking this supplement long enough to see any health benefits but I can offer a word of advice for those contemplating buying it....make sure you take it at the BEGINNING of a heavy meal as the food you eat will keep the bad taste of the supplement from revisiting your mouth if you burp. Seriously hard to get rid if that taste if you take on an empty stomach or with a few bites of food!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Marchant

product_meta.title: Black Seed Oil - 120 Softgel Capsules (Non-GMO & Vegetarian) Premium Cold-Pressed Nigella Sativa Producing Pure Black Cumin Seed Oil with Vitamin E - 500mg Each, 1000mg Per Serving
feature_bullets: COLD-PRESSED BLACK SEED OIL SOFTGEL CAPSULES: We source the wonderful plant Nigella Staiva from its natural home, capture it all in a 500mg capsule along with natural Vitamin E and manufacture it right here in the USA. The result is a superior-quality black cumin seed oil supplement that conveys all the benefits in an easy-to-swallow liquid capsule with no foul taste.

REDISCOVER AN ANCIENT SECRET: Black Seed Oil (aka Kalonji Oil) has been used traditionally for thousands of years - as far back as the Egyptian Pharaohs! Now, it's now seeing a resurgent boom in popularity and scientific interest. Pure, cold-pressed black seed oil in softgel form is hard to find in today’s market. Order your 60 day supply (1 bottle) of this ancient secret, and bring yourself the myriad benefits of this unique plant that’s taking the scientific world by storm!

NATURAL DEFENSE: The chemical compounds thymoquinone (TQ), thymohydroquinone (THQ) and thymol are most effective when working together, and are naturally occurring in Nigella Sativa. On the outside, the combined antioxidant properties of Black Seed and Vitamin E promote stronger hair roots and increased melanin production which helps maintain healthy skin.

MANUFACTURED TO IMMACULATE STANDARDS: We manufacture these vegetarian, non-GMO softgels in a GMP-certified facility right here in the USA. The two piece capsules are filled with our precision formula in the presence of pure nitrogen to keep oxygen out and ensure your Black Seed oil remains pure and unspoiled.
